Name: Spell Sweeper
About the game: Spell Sweeper is a puzzle game which based on 'Minesweeper'. You get summon by 'Square' country and fight against 'Sphere' country as a Hero. Your goal is to defeat the BOSS! How To Fight? Fighting is so simple. 1: Open squares and Place flags on spells. 2: Then start attack! When you open enemy spell, you just lose your 'PP'! 　No need to worry about mistake! Skill and PP In this game there are 'Skill' and 'PP(Pride Point)' * By using 'Skill', you can see inside of unopen square. * Hero has a 'PP' and if you lose too much 'PP', you will die. 　 So Be Careful! Get EXP! And Level Up! You will get 'EXP' after win each battle. And each time level up, you get +1 PP! Get strong and try defeat the BOSS!
